scripts.setup: yarn clean:remove && yarn install --ignore-engines && npx pod-install
scripts.build:android: react-native bundle --platform android --dev false --entry-file index.android.js --bundle-output android/app/src/main/assets/index.android.bundle --assets-dest android/app/src/main/res/
scripts.build:apk:debug: ./android/gradlew --stop && npx jetify && cd android && ./gradlew clean bundleDebugJsAndAssets copyDebugBundledJs assembleDebug && cd ..
scripts.build:apk:staging: ./android/gradlew --stop && npx jetify && cd android && ./gradlew clean bundleStagingJsAndAssets copyStagingBundledJs assembleStaging && cd ..
scripts.build:apk:release: ./android/gradlew --stop && npx jetify && cd android && ./gradlew clean bundleReleaseJsAndAssets copyReleaseBundledJs assembleRelease && cd ..
scripts.android:clean: ./android/gradlew --stop && cd android && ./gradlew clean && cd .. && npx jetify && react-native run-android
scripts.clean:android: ./android/gradlew --stop && cd android && ./gradlew clean && cd .. && npx jetify
scripts.clean:remove: rm -rf node_modules/ && rm -rf ios/Pods/ && rm -rf android/app/build && watchman watch-del-all && rm -rf ios/build && rm -rf ~/Library/Developer/Xcode/DerivedData
